text: Nudium or Noudion () was one of the six cities (along with Lepreum, Phrixae, Pyrgus, Epium, and Macistus) founded by the Minyans in the territory of the Paroreatae and Caucones, in Triphylia in ancient Elis, but which was destroyed by the Eleians in the time of Herodotus. It is unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Elis Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Triphylia Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Nudium
